item.title: ASP.NET Core BFF using OpenID Connect and Vue.js
item.description: This article shows how to implement a secure web application using Vue.js and ASP.NET Core. The web application implements the backend for frontend security architecture (BFF) and deploys both technical stacks as one web application. HTTP only secure cookies are used to persist the session.
